name: RAMCleaner
tagline: RAMCleaner is a free program for Linux to clean out your sytem's RAM to improve performance
body:
### Welcome to RAMCleaner
RAMCleaner cleans out the unused cache in your system to impove performance and to allow programs to utilize it more. To use RAMCleaner, put the ramcleaner.sh file in your home folder and type

```
sudo sh ramcleaner.sh
```

If you do not use sudo or root, account the program will not run because it needs root access.

### News
RAMCleaner v2.0 will soon go under development! Stay tuned for details anf for updates. 

### Other Products
I will soon be making a program named SwipeSwap which will wipe the memory out of Swap to spped your computer up.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
